name: multi-year play-by-play column without year split should not group by year
description: Regression test: play-by-play columns with multi-year params but no year split should aggregate across all years in a single row per player, not create duplicate rows per year. Fixed bug where CTE incorrectly grouped by year when params.year existed but splits did not include year.
expected_query: with "tf92880184b89ba1dc3914672b8bd9de3" as (select COALESCE(psr_pid) as pid, SUM(epa) as passing_expected_points_added_from_plays from "nfl_plays" where not "play_type" = 'NOPL' and "nfl_plays"."year" in (2023, 2024, 2025) and "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG') group by COALESCE(psr_pid)) select "player"."pid", player.fname, player.lname, "tf92880184b89ba1dc3914672b8bd9de3"."passing_expected_points_added_from_plays" AS "passing_expected_points_added_from_plays_0", "player"."pos" from "player" left join "tf92880184b89ba1dc3914672b8bd9de3" on "tf92880184b89ba1dc3914672b8bd9de3"."pid" = "player"."pid" where player.pos IN ('QB') group by player.fname, player.lname, "tf92880184b89ba1dc3914672b8bd9de3"."passing_expected_points_added_from_plays", "player"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by 4 DESC NULLS LAST, "player"."pid" asc limit 500
